info.name: EM1
info.description: This test collection is to test the em1 worker api. This worker contains model functionality related to the SED EM1 model.

exec: console.log("Sleeping for 3 seconds before next request.");
console.log("Sleeping for 3 seconds before next request.");

item.name: GET  v1/EM1/runs/task_id success post no end_training

exec: var jsonresponse = JSON.parse('{ "errors": { "data": { "attributes": { "well": { "sections": { "0": { "hydraulics": [ "Missing data for required field." ] } } } } } } }');
var jsonresponse = JSON.parse('{ "errors": { "data": { "attributes": { "scenario": { "well": { "sections": { "0": { "hydraulics": [ "Missing data for required field." ] } } } } } } } }');
console.log("Sleeping for 3 seconds before next request.");

item.name: GET  v1/EM1/runs/task_id seismic events not in time window

exec: var jsonresponse = JSON.parse('{"data": {"id": "'+pm.environment.get("post_id2")+'", "attributes": {"status": "ModelError-ModelAdaptor", "status_code": 500, "warning": "Caught in default model exception handler. Too few seismic events found, model will not continue."}}}');
console.log("Sleeping for 5 seconds before next request.");
console.log("Sleeping for 5 seconds before next request.");

item.name: POST v1/EM1/runs test no events in catalog

exec: console.log("Sleeping for 5 seconds before next request.");
console.log("Sleeping for 3 seconds before next request.");

item.name: POST v1/EM1/runs reservoir catalog filtering depth

exec: console.log("Sleeping for 3 seconds before next request.");

item.name: GET  v1/EM1/runs/task_id filter catalog on depth - too few events

exec: // As the model requires more than one event, the request made to the model where only one event is valid in depth returns a model error.

var jsonresponse = JSON.parse('{"data": {"id": "'+pm.environment.get("post_id6")+'", "attributes": {"status": "ModelError-ModelAdaptor", "status_code": 500, "warning": "Caught in default model exception handler. Too few seismic events found, model will not continue."}}}');

item.name: POST v1/EM1/runs reservoir catalog filtering longitude

exec: console.log("Sleeping for 3 seconds before next request.");

item.name: GET  v1/EM1/runs/task_id filter catalog on longitude - too few events Copy

exec: var jsonresponse = JSON.parse('{"data": {"id": "'+pm.environment.get("post_id7")+'", "attributes": {"status": "ModelError-ModelAdaptor", "status_code": 500, "warning": "Caught in default model exception handler. Too few seismic events found, model will not continue."}}}');

item.name: POST v1/EM1/runs shut in hydraulics plan

exec: console.log("Sleeping for 3 seconds before next request.");
console.log("Sleeping for 3 seconds before next request.");

var jsonresponse = JSON.parse('{"data": {"id": "'+pm.environment.get("post_id9")+'", "attributes": {"status": "ModelError-ModelAdaptor", "status_code": 500, "warning": "Caught in default model exception handler. Negative cumulative volume in training period."}}}');
console.log("Sleeping for 3 seconds before next request.");
